belongs_to_collection.name: How to Train Your Dragon Collection

response.overview: As the son of a Viking leader on the cusp of manhood, shy Hiccup Horrendous Haddock III faces a rite of passage: he must kill a dragon to prove his warrior mettle. But after downing a feared dragon, he realizes that he no longer wants to destroy it, and instead befriends the beast – which he names Toothless – much to the chagrin of his warrior father.
response.tagline: One adventure will change two worlds
response.title: How to Train Your Dragon
